# TPT2-Scripts
> Just some AI scripts for a silly game

## Auto Asteroid Mining

__Requires 10 Workers on Asteroid Tasks. Recommended to use Quick Scan and to have a decent Power Plant boost for Mine.__

`Impulse: A`

A short 10 line script that scans 10 asteroids, waits a certain amount of time for the workers to finish mining, then collects and deletes all asteroids, and repeats. Resolution independent as well, but does not support Dynamic UI.

To properly set up, you will have to edit the two `wait` functions in the script. Time how long scanning an asteroid takes, and change the first wait time to it, then time how long fully mining a very high AU distance asteroid takes with a worker and change the second wait time to it + a few seconds (2-5) depending on how close to max AU distance it is.

`autoasteroids 1 1 10`
